br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.interfaces

Interface AdventurerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Adventurer

    public interface AdventurerListener
    Interface that implements common methods from Adventurer class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: Feb 8, 2014
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • addAdvantage

        boolean addAdvantage(Advantage advantage)
        Method to add an Advantage instance to list.
        Parameters:
        advantage - - Advantage instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if instance was successfully added or false otherwise.

      • addAttribute

        boolean addAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Method to add an Attribute instance to list.
        Parameters:
        attribute - - Attribute instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if instance was successfully added or false otherwise.

      • addJob

        boolean addJob(Job job)
        Method to add an Job instance to list.
        Parameters:
        job - - Job instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if instance was successfully added or false otherwise.

      • addStatus

        boolean addStatus(Adventurer.Status status)
        Method to add an Adventurer.Status instance to list.
        Parameters:
        status - - Adventurer.Status instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if instance was successfully added or false otherwise.

      • attack

        int attack(java.util.List<Attribute.Type> types)
        Method to calculate the damage caused by Adventurer instance's attack.
        Parameters:
        types - - List of Attribute.Type. This list must contain the Attribute.Type of Attribute instances will be used to calculate the damage caused by Adventurer instance's attack.
        Returns:
        Integer damage caused by Adventurer instance's attack.

      • block

        int block(java.util.List<Attribute.Type> types)
        Method to calculate the amount will be absorbed from Adventurer instance's attack.
        Parameters:
        types - - List of Attribute.Type. This list must contain the Attribute.Type of Attribute instances will be used to calculate the damage caused by Adventurer instance's attack.
        Returns:
        Integer amount absorbed from Adventurer instance's attack.

      • buyItem

        boolean buyItem(Item item)
        Method to be called when Adventurer instance buys an Item instance.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Item instance will be purchased or false otherwise.

      • containsAttribute

        boolean containsAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Method to verify if Adventurer contains Attribute instance passed through parameter.
        Parameters:
        attribute - - Attribute instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Adventurer contains Attribute instance or false otherwise.

      • containsJob

        boolean containsJob(Job job)
        Method to verify if Adventurer contains Job instance passed through parameter.
        Parameters:
        job - - Job instance.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Adventurer contains Job instance or false otherwise.

      • create

        void create(long id,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          Adventurer.Gender gender,
          int age,
          int height,
          double weight,
          int xp,
          int ap,
          long score,
          long coins,
          Race race)
        Creates instance of Adventurer.
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        gender - - Adventurer.Gender type.
        age - - object's age. It must be bigger than 0.
        height - - object's height. It must be bigger than 0.
        weight - - object's weight. It must be bigger than 0.
        xp - - object's experience. It must be bigger than 0.
        ap - - object's ap experience. It must be bigger than 0.
        score - - object's score. It must be equal or bigger than 0.
        coins - - object's money. It must be bigger than 0.
        race - - object's Race instance. It cannot be null.

      • decreaseAP

        void decreaseAP(int decrement)
        Method to decrement from ap experience.
        Parameters:
        decrement - - Integer that stores amount of decrement from ap experience.

      • decreaseXP

        void decreaseXP(int decrement)
        Method to decrement from xp experience.
        Parameters:
        decrement - - Integer that stores amount of decrement from xp experience.

      • equipItem

        boolean equipItem(Item item)
        Method to equip Item instance on Adventurer instance.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item instance to be equipped.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if item was successfully equipped or false otherwise.

      • getAttributeValue

        int getAttributeValue(Attribute.Type type)
        Return value from Attribute.Type parameter. If it wasn't possible to find Attribute on Adventurer from parameter, it returns -1.
        Parameters:
        type - - Attribute.Type type.
        Returns:
        Integer value from Attribute.Type or -1 if Attribute.Type hasn't been found.

      • hasItem

        int hasItem(Item item)
        Return Item instance's position or -1 if there is no Item instance on Adventurer from parameter.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item instance.
        Returns:
        Integer Item instance's position or -1 if it hasn't been found.

      • increaseAP

        void increaseAP(int increment)
        Increment ap experience.
        Parameters:
        increment - - Integer value to be incremented on ap experience.

      • increaseXP

        void increaseXP(int increment)
        Increment xp.
        Parameters:
        increment - - Integer value to be increment on xp.

        Boolean true if Job instance has leveled up or false otherwise.

        Method to increment Adventurer instance's coins.
        Parameters:

      • unequipItem

        boolean unequipItem(Item item)
        Method to unequip an Item instance.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item instance to be unequiped.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Item instance has been unequiped or false otherwise.

      • upgrade

        boolean upgrade()
        Method to upgrade a Job. This method only returns true if the actual Job instance has been set a nextJob variable. All the nextJob prerequisites must be satisfied.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if Adventurer job has been upgraded or false otherwise.
